title: Advanced Features

title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
content: Having trouble? Here's how to troubleshoot common issues...

title: Changing Your Profile Name
content:
If you need to update your profile name, follow these simple steps to make the change. It's quick and easy!

## Step-by-Step Guide

1. **Log In**: First, make sure you are logged into your account. If you're not logged in, you can do so [here](https://app.mediaapp.local/login).

2. **Navigate to Settings**: Once logged in, go to the **Settings** page by clicking [this link](https://app.mediaapp.local/settings) or selecting 'Settings' from the user menu.

3. **Access Account Settings**: In the **Settings** page, click on the **Account** tab to access your account settings.

4. **Change Your Name**: In the Account settings, you'll find an option to change your profile name. Enter your preferred name in the provided field.

5. **Save Changes**: After entering your new name, click the **Update Settings** button to save your changes.

6. **Confirmation**: Upon successful update, you will see a toast notification confirming that your profile name has been changed.

## Additional Information

- If you encounter any issues while changing your name, please contact our support team for assistance.
- Remember, your profile name is visible to other users on the platform, so choose a name that you are comfortable with.

Thank you for being a part of our community!

title: Peeking at a Storyline from a Story
content:
# How to Peek at a Storyline from a Story Card

Want to get a quick glimpse of a storyline without diving into the full story? Here's how you can peek at the storyline from a story card.

## Step-by-Step Guide

1. **Navigate to the Story Card**: First, find the story you are interested in. You can do this by browsing through the available stories on our platform.

2. **Locate the Clock Icon**: On the story card, look for the clock icon which looks like this:


   <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2.5" class="w-6 h-6 mr-2" viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true">
     <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle>
     <path d="M12 6v6l4 2"></path>
   </svg>


3. **Hover Over the Icon**: Move your cursor over the clock icon. When you hover over it, a pop-up will appear.

4. **View the Storyline**: The pop-up will provide a brief overview or 'peek' of the storyline. This allows you to quickly understand the gist of the story without reading the entire content.

## Tips

- The storyline peek is designed to give you a quick summary. For the full story, click on the story card to read more.
- If the pop-up does not appear, make sure your cursor is directly over the clock icon.

Enjoy exploring stories in a more efficient way!
summary:
How to Peek at a Storyline from a Story Card

Want to get a quick glimpse of a storyline without diving into the full story? Here's how you can peek at the storyline from a story...
